content: the bathroom doesn t have to be a dull and boring place to be bring a little bit of decorative style into your bathroom with this simple and pretty farmhouse style crochet hand towel pattern designed to be both useful and pretty this crochet bathroom hand towel pattern has a large section of double crochets for optimal hand drying space and decorative edges for a touch of beauty and elegance skill level easy/advanced beginner - crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to chain single_crochet and double_crochet the decorative edging of this crochet hand towel pattern does require a slightly more advanced technique which includes creating chain spaces and working into them if you haven t already learned how to create or work into chain spaces don t worry you can find a full photo tutorial in the pdf as well as a tutorial on my blog for the stitch pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial for row 1 through 10 which will set you up to properly repeat the row as necessary this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture and 3 pages to save ink terms used us standard pattern is written in english size length approx 16 inches width approx 11 5 inches materials required for this pattern you will need medium 4 weight cotton yarn in two colors color a 1 5 ounces/ 42 grams/ 44 yards color b 1 8 ounces/ 51 grams/ 92 yards yarn used yarn bee pima suprema in bone color a and charcoal color b tools 5 mm h-8 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work happy crocheting the loophole fox
